33016.name: A Rebuilt Room
description: This room has the general appearance of being under construction.
Almost the entire wall the room shares with the hall is gone and
replaced by a large door.  About half the stones that make up the
doorway is a {wbrighter grey{x color than those of the rest of the wall.
The large wooden door takes up most of the wall and it is obvious that
it is one of the larger species of the realms that inhabit this room.
As the details sink in it is obvious that the room is not under
construction after all, it has merely been adapted to a larger
creature than it was originally designed for.  There is a faint smell
of rot and sulphur in the air.

33003.name: {!Cr{1im{!so{1n {BGu{bar{*di{ban {BPortal Room 1{x
description: About a league into the forest, behind the Guardian Stronghold, is
a enclosed grove.  Twisted about, ancient trees stretch up to form a
oaken dome that creates a hallowed sylvan scape.  A minute amount of
light penetrates the canopy to illuminate the standing stones
strategically place in a circular pattern.  Within the archways of the
monoliths, air ripples due to a breach of reality that links to
another part of the world.
{!North: {&H{8ou{&se {8of the {&M{8oo{&n{x
{MEast:  {&Sanctuary to the Temple of {!Th{1e {#Mo{&rni{#ng {!Lo{1rd{x
{mWest:  {BAnarchist Brewers Lobby{x
{#Up:    {BMarket Square{x
{yDown:  {RH{mell{x

33018.name: {GS{ganchin's {GG{grove{x
description: {DSanchi{gn's grov{ge is a syn{wthesi{gs of marb{gle and wood{D, with{x
{Dlife s{gomehow bir{gthed from {wthe s{gtrange br{gew. Muted{D footsteps{x
{Dreverb{gerate off of{g the tiles {wof g{green vein{ged marb{Dle. Fluted{x
{Dmarble{g columns set in{gto the wal{wl ar{ge transfo{grmed{D into trees{x
{Das the{gy reach to th{ge sky. The{w cal{gl of a bl{guejay i{Dntrudes from{x
{Dtime t{go time fro{gm where sh{we has{g made her{g nest ami{Dd the upper{x
{Dbranch{ges. For {gall the op{wen ar{gea above{g you, the gr{Dove is quiet{x
{Dsave f{gor the {grustle of{w leav{ges in th{ge breeze.{x

33011.name: Xairin's Room
description: {cYou are in a room filled with the fragrance of {ySa{rnd{ylew{ro{yod{c and
{yDra{rg{yons{rb{ylood{c.  The room is decorated in {yw{Ra{yr{Rm{c colours, from the {ydried
{Mf{Rl{Bo{Cw{Re{Wr{Ys{c on the beareu to the soft {wbeige{c of the curtains on the {Wpillars
{cthat surround the bed.  On the {Wwalls{c are several {*black {cand {Wwhite
{cdrawings of places around Westbridge and New Thalos.  In the corner by
the {Yfi{Rre{Ypl{Rac{Ye{c is an easle with a half finished still-life painting and
a few scattered bottles of paint.  {x

33028.name: Topiary Maze
description: Tall boxwood hedges are trimmed into straight walls marking the
entrance of a small labrynth.  Low wooden benches are spread out at
even intervals throughout the shrubbery, lest one become over-weary
from exploring.  Each turn finds topiary masterpieces of rabbits,
swans, castles and the like.  You can't help noticing the half-hidden
arrows that point the way out of the maze.

33032.name: {!W{#h{1i{3r{!l{#w{1i{3n{!d {#S{1p{3e{!l{#l{1f{3i{!r{#e{x
description: {!F{1l{#a{3m{1e{#s {!suddenly surround you; you have arrived into a place of
unbearable heat.  Sweat pours from your neck as you wonder why you
are here.  Trying to exit would be a thought not worth thinking.
You feel the aura of another person surrounding you.{x

33017.name: Trakand's Room
description: Here lies the room of a powerful Titan called Trakand`Sedai.  As
you enter this rooms, you feel a slight breeze blowing hard on you.
You start to shiver in coldness, thinking to yourself, 'Where Have I
Stumbled Into?  This place is creepy!  '.  As you look closely there
is a chair, most likely a throne made out of gold and platinum,
engraved there, there is a symbol of a cross shining, hurting your eye
so badly, most likely you better leave this place.

33014.name: {!Fla{1me {*Sanc{1tu{!ary{x
description: {1Fla{!mes g{1lim{#mer t{1hrou{8gh {!th{#i{1s ent{8ire ro{!om,{# a{1s if{! the wa{8lls
{1th{!emse{1lves{# are {1made {8of {!fir{#e{1.  Des{8pite {!the{# f{1ire{!, this {8room
{1{!reall{1y i{#s not {1unbea{8rabl{!y h{#ot{1, the {8flames{! b{#ei{1ng {!comple{8tely
{1{!magi{1cal{# in n{1ature.{8  Th{!e da{#nc{1ing ene{8rgy al{!so {#th{1ro{!ws a f{8ar
{1{!soft{1er{# ligh{1t aro{8und t{!he r{#oom{1 than y{8ou woul{!d a{#nt{1ici{!pate,{8 and
{1{!in f{1ac{#t, i{1f the{8 cen{!tral {#lam{1p in the{8 room w{!ere {#to{1 be{! turne{8d
{1{!off, {1t{#he r{1oom {8woul{!d pr{#obab{1ly be da{8rk save {!the {#wa{1lls.{!  On
{1{!the no{1r{#the{1rn w{8all{!, mo{#vin{1g amidst {8the flam{!e, is{# a{1 mag{!ical
{1{!statue o{1{#f a{1 be{8aut{!ifu{#l a{1vian wom{8an, a mag{!ical {#re{1minde{!r of
{1Th{!ryne's {1l{#ov{1e.{x

33005.name: {!Cr{1im{!so{1n {BGu{bar{*di{ban {BCoffee Shop{x
description: You have entered a room to relax.  The Swiss Miss is here ready to
sell you food and drink.  Soft music plays in the background, you
can't help but tap your foot to the beat.  Have a seat at the table,
stretch your arms and legs, chat with the other people.  Just plain
RELAX.

33029.name: Garden Path
description: Blooms of every color and kind sprout from the earth here: irises,
roses, orchids, pansies, crocuses, daffodils.  Surely this is
enchanted ground, for there is no species of oplant that will not
grow, and the buds bloom all the year with no reagrd to season.  You
watch a bee suck the sweet nectar from a flower and momentarily forget
the cares and strifes outside these hallowed walls.

33034.name: Long Hallway
description: This long and winding hallway seems to travel for a while.  You can
see vivid tapistries on the walls along with tall candle holders that
illuminate the hallway.  Doors leading in all directions give off some
light but not much.
{!North: {BDieppe's Room{x
{MEast: {BAvlad's Room{x
{mWest: {!Fla{1me {*Sanc{1tu{!ary{x
{#Up: {BDeamien's Mountaintop{x
{3Down: {BS{Cp{7a{Cc{Be {G({BPs{byl{Cin{bce{B's {!D{1o{#ma{1i{!n{G){x

33036.name: Deamien's Mountaintop
description: As you step into the room you find yourself no longer in a building
but standing on what appears to be a forrested mountaintop.  There is
a waterfall flowing over to the left with forest animals drinking and
walking about.  You feel a sense of peace flowing around you.  To the
east you can see a beautiful sunrise with the sun just cresting the
horizon.

33037.name: Depths of the Universe
description: {&You walk into a rather dark room, with only a few candles
flickering here and there A cold draft washes over you, as you gaze
into the fireplace that looks as though it has not been lit in a very
long time.  The shadows on the wall change shape and sizes and seem to
be those of people standing in the room.  In the corner you see an old
rocking chair slowly moving back and forth, creaking as it does so.  {x

33024.name: Long Hallway
description: This long and winding hallway seems to travel for a while.  You can
see vivid tapistries on the walls along with tall candle holders that
illuminate the hallway.  Doors leading in all directions give off some
light but not much.  The hallway continues north.
{MEast: {BVentor's Office
{1South: {BLeora's Room
{mWest: {3E{#ll{&i{7z{*a{7b{&e{#th'{3s {2R{@oo{2m
{#Up: {BBaquri's Treehouse{x

33047.name: Dr. Schwartz's Secret Laboratory
description: There is considerably more {Ylight{x.  In here than you have seen since
you entered the cellars, but this light has a sickly yellow gleam.  In
the middle of the room a giant humanoid is fastoned to some kind of a
chair.  He looks dead...  REALLY dead.  A second chair stands besides
the large one, with a strange kind of helmet hanging from it.  Shelves
filled with funny glass jars line the walls.  Upon closer examination
you see brains resting in many of them.  All the jars are labelled.
The only exit is back south.

33050.name: {!Cr{1im{!so{1n {BGu{bar{*di{ban {BTraining Room{x
description: Weapons of all kinds hang on the walls all around you.  Many spell
books lay open to various pages.  Everything you would need to learn
for your class can be tought to you in this very room.  The smell of
sweat tweeks your nose.  You can tell many people have already used
the training room despite its newness.

33004.name: {BThe Gu{bar{*di{ban {BPortal Room{x
description: You step into the second guardian portal room.  Colourful
portals surround you.  As you gaze upon there beautiy, you notice
a glimps of the action on the other side.

33000.name: {!Cr{1im{!so{1n {BGu{bar{*di{ban {BCouncil Room{x
description: Vesper laden stones fashion the ancient archways of the main
chamber.  On either side of the entrance, granite holders burn
dragon's blood creating a taut vaporous stream arcing towards the
muraled ceiling.  Long ceremonial tapirs, mounted in candelabras, line
the back wall collecting into a mass gathering of illumination.  There
they cast an eerie radiance over several vivid tapestries of forgotten
lore.  At the center of the grand hall lays a massive stone table set
atop a mosaic of the heavens that spirals outward.
The incense burns upward in a hypnotic spiral.
The colossal tapestries portray the hunt of the white hart through Myth Drannor.
A mural is painted on the ceiling in once vivid colors.
A long thick candle shedding light across the chamber.
A piller of iron gathered in spirals to hold tapirs.
The mural depicts the forgotten clash between the forces of the Netheral and the common man in mortal.
The stones of the archway appear to be some of the oldest in the land.

33038.name: {BS{^p{0a{^c{Be {@({BPs{4yl{^in{4ce{B's {!D{1o{#ma{1i{!n{@){x
description: {0You are here in Psylince's {BR{^eal{Bm.  {0 You look {#up{x {0and see nothing but
{&stars {0and {%planets.  {x {0You look around and notice a {Bpool {@table {0to the
left of you and an enchanting {!  J{@a{#c{Bo{%o{^z{&i{*e {0to the right.  You notice
they aren't standing on anything, and you look down.  All you see is
space filled with more Stars and Planets below you.  You realize that
you are in some really big transparent Cube which is at the center of
the whole universe.  You are mezmerized by this discovery.  You come
out of the trance and wonder how many {!G{1i{#r{3l{!s{x Psylince has been
with on that Pool Table and Jacoozie.

33030.name: Approching a Great Hall
description: You walk along a narrow path, the trees are so think you can hardly
see a thing.  As you come closer, you make out a large building with
the symbol of the {!Cr{1im{!so{1n {BGu{bar{*di{ban{Bs{x atop the center tower.  You
hear the great noise of laughter and conversation comming from the
inside.  cuChulainn is here, keeping a close eye on you.

33007.name: Hallway
description: This long and winding hallway seems to travel for a while.  You can
see vivid tapistries on the walls along with tall candle holders that
illuminate the hallway.  To the east the hallway continues into the
personal quartes of the Crimson Guardians.

33027.name: Herb Garden
description: This portion of the garden is set aside for herbs of every species.
Flowers less elaborate the the ornamental fauna gracee the shrubs and
blend their scents with the plants throughout the garden.  Herbs for
cooking, healing, and every other use imaginable can be found here - A
great resource for druids and clerics of the Guardian family.  What is
that somewhat pungent smell from the south?

33046.name: The End
description: As you enter this last part of the wine cellars you notice that the
cobwebs are gone.  Apparently not even spiders believe that there is
anything here worth catching.  As you are about to turn around and
leave, you notice something engraved in the wall.  Upon closer
inspection you notice a {Rheart{x with the letters "K+P" in it.  The only
exit is back west.

33025.name: {!Cr{1im{!so{1n {BGu{bar{*di{ban {BArmor Shop{x
description: The light of strategic lanterns illuminates the cluttered shop, and
light dances off the blades of weapons.  Implements from the
far-reaches of the realms have been gathered and sorted before being
offered for your perusal.  The shopkeeper eyes you suspicously,
waiting for you to make your selection and move on.

33041.name: Downtrance
description: As you slowly descend into the cellar, you notice that the
temperature is dropping and that all the moisture is vanishing from
the air.  The doorway at the end of the staircase is beautifully
ornamented with strange symbols of power.  Only one of these runes
makes any sense to you and you identify it as a major rune of
blasting.  When you enter the cellars you notice a skeleton with a
small piece of paper in it's hand.  Exits from this room leads west
east and back up the stairs.

33009.name: Kairi's Room
description: The peace of the hall is disturbed when you enter this room.  Loud
hard rock music is being played by a huge red jukebox.  The walls are
covered almost totaly by posters of the coolest rock bands of the
realms.  The room itself is a mess, clothes everywhere, half drinked
soda bottles lying around.  Theres a kingsized bed on the back of the
room and on top of it, hanging from the wall, is a red warlock guitar.
On the other side of the room theres a desk with lots of doddled
parchments and ink.  On top of the desk you see a big photo of some of
his closest friends from the clan, Liliandra, Retyon, Ryel, Taryn,
Sarlekk, Garret, Kossuth and himself.

33045.name: Strong Wine Storeroom
description: The shelves lining these walls are filed with very dusty old
bottles.  After a little dusting you notice some signs on the shelves
reading: "Champagne", "Moscatel", "portwine", "Sherry", "Cognac" and
"Whiskey".  During the dusting you notice a bottle completely clean of
dust, it somehow seems out of place.  The cave extends west and east.

33023.name: Baq's Nest
description: You have entered a room that is obviously used for sleeping.  A
circular bed is here, which vaguely resembles a large nest!  Some
miscellaneous items are stored on a shelf against one wall, near the
door.  The other three walls have large windows to allow the breeze to
blow through.

33021.name: Leora's Room
description: A quaint little room filled with the love and warmth of a young
lady who knows how to make a room a home.  A canopied bed occupies the
far wall, a dresser is on the right while a small couch is on the
right.  She keeps it lit by a small lamp that sits on the bed table
beside the enormous spell book which she must continually read.  At
this point you can make it that anyone who enters hear a voice saying
welcome make your self at home.

33008.name: Hallway
description: This long and winding hallway seems to travel for a while.  You can
see vivid tapistries on the walls along with tall candle holders that
illuminate the hallway.  Doors leading in all directions give off some
light but not much.
{!North:{B Depths of the Universe{x
{1South:{B Avlad's Room{x

33019.name: Ventor's Office
description: Rich panels of dark mahogany give this rooms a warm welcoming
atmosphere.  A large oak desk sits to one end of the room illumintated
from behind by tall windows opening onto the courtyard below.  A
sitting are is off to your left with several chairs around a cozy
fireplace.  Bookshelves line most of the walls, many of them
overflowing with micellaneous items found on many an adventure.

33052.name: {RCr{rim{Rso{rn {BGu{bar{8di{ban {BTraining Armor Dealer
description: Racks of armor and weapons line the walls of this room.  Pryderi stands
off to one side sharpening one of the many fine tools of his trade.
The walls here are covered in tapestries depicting the many battles
the Guardian's have sent aid to.

33015.name: {RCr{rim{Rso{rn {BGu{bar{8di{ban {BApothecary{x
description: The lamps are low in this room as light degrades potions over time.  Cu Roi
is here mixing components of the potions that the Crimson Guardians rely
on.  Racks of bottles and scrolls line the wall behind the old sorcerer.
He eyes you over his table waiting for you to make a selection.

33020.name: Baquri's Treehouse Roost
description: You are in a treehouse, overlooking the forest.  Although the house
is in a tree, it still is a comfortable, cozy place.  Looking out the
window, you see the tops of the trees...  And a few hawks circling in
an thermal updraft.  There is a ledge outside the main, large window.
The only exit from the house is down...  Unless you can fly!

33035.name: Avlad's Room
description: The entire room has a holy feeling, mostly because of the holy
symbols that adorn the walls.  There are paintings of Avlad's friends
hanging on the walls.  A bed is on one corner, a chair in the other,
and a dresser to hold Avlad's clothes, armor and other assorted
objects.  The place is extremely clean, nothing is messy at all.

33002.name: {&Sanctuary {Bof the {!Cr{1im{!so{1n {BGu{bar{*di{ban{Bs{x
description: Stepping into this room you notice the bubbling healing pools right
away.  Marbel floors are beneath your feet as you gaze at paintings of
the many beautiful places within the realms.  Morann is standing by
ready to heal any injuries you may have encountered on your
adventures.  The spiral staircase will lead you to the 2nd floor of the
hall as well as the basement.  A library is to your east and a nice
coffee shop is in the southern direction.

33013.name: Long Hallway
description: This long and winding hallway seems to travel for a while.  You can
see vivid tapistries on the walls along with tall candle holders that
illuminate the hallway.  Doors leading in all directions give off some
light but not much.
{!North: {!Fla{1me {*Sanc{!tuary{x
{MEast:  {BKairi's Room{x
{1South: {BXairin's Room{x

33042.name: Red wine storage room
description: This room is a part of the long cave that is the cellars of the
Crimson Guardians clan hall.  It is completely carved from the rock
and thus not very roomy.  The larger species of the realms have a hard
time getting around down here, though it is possible.  There are
several rows of shelves, set into the rock in a human arms length
depression in the northern and southern walls, filled with old bottles
old dusty bottles of wine.  The cavern continues west to the staircase
and east further into the cavern.

33010.name: {!Cr{1im{!so{1n {BGu{bar{*di{ban {BInterview Room{x
description: Entering a small white room you see a highly polished oak siting
table in the middle of the room with soft couches on either side of
it.  On the far wall sits the {BGu{bar{*di{ban{x crest set above an inset marble
fireplace.

33051.name: Hallway
description: This long and winding hallway seems to travel for a while.  You can
see vivid tapistries on the walls along with tall candle holders that
illuminate the hallway.

33039.name: {!Cr{1im{!so{1n {BGu{bar{*di{ban {BMount Shop{x
description: You have walked into the Crimson Guardian Mount Shop.  Hay and
grass line the floors giving off a nasty smell.  If it were not for
the garden to the north, you would fall over from the smell.  Old,
wooden, brown doors block off the exit of these magnificent animals.
A short but sturdy fellow with a cocked eye looks at you wondering
what you are doing in the stable.  You notice some old wooden planks
being covered by a rather large pile of hay.

33043.name: White wine storage room
description: This part of the caves forms a crude "L"-bend.  It is obvious that
the sheer effort of carving this cellar from the rocks have kept its
constructors from trying to make it artistic, it "merely" serves a
purpose.  In the northern and eastern walls a depression the depth of
a humans arm hold several shelves lodged into the sides of it, which
hold several dusty bottles of wine.  The caverns continue to the west,
to the staircase and to the south further into the cellars of the
Guardians.

33001.name: {!Cr{1im{!so{1n {BGu{bar{*di{ban {BPractice Room{x
description: You step outside into a field.  The grass and various plants grow
quite high here, except for a gigantic circle to do battle with the
training dummy, Queen Maeve.  This is the place to vent any
frustrations you may have encountered during the day or simply to
improve your combat skills.  To the north you can bairly see another
circle due to the high plant life, you wonder what that could be.

33048.name: Beer and Equipment Storage.
description: As you enter the room the first thing that strikes you is that it
smells faintly of old grapes (provided your character has a sense of
smell, of course).  You notice a couple of big wooden bathtubs, which
have apparently been used to mash grapes in some time long ago.
Several large kegs of beer line the northern, western and southern
walls.  The cave extends to the east.

33012.name: The Temple of Crescents
description: Walls of glossy obsidian arch to meet seamlessly with the high
domed ceiling.  A lunar disk rests in the vaulted heights, magically
collecting thelight of the moon every evening and diffusing it into
this chamber.  Shafts of light stream from the disk to hit ivory
engravings of the lunar phases on the ebony rock surface.  A carpet
of emerald grass covers the entirety of the room, promising peaceful
slumber. Echoed prayers to the Moon Maiden reverberate peacefully
without end, offering a sence of tranquility.

33049.name: The secret storage room
description: This room lies well hidden through a secret tunnel in a large
beer-keg.  Lots of bottles and wineskins lie on shelves in all walls
of the room.  Only the northern wall, which holds the beer-keg has no
shelves, otherwise this looks like a natural cave which has been
polished to suit the needs of creatures of human size or smaller.  The
Crimson Guardians seem to be surprisingly well stocked in the booze
department.

33026.name: Cafe Patio
description: Intricately carved chairs and tables are scattered throughout this
area, a favorite place from which Guardians observe the sports in the
garden.  Ancient vines cover the trellis, ceilings, and walls, and the
blossoms' fragrance wafts over you on a brezze.

33006.name: {!Cr{1im{!so{1n {BGu{bar{*di{ban {BSparring Room{x
description: A place to cure boredom, the Guardian Sparring Room.  Windows that
stretch from the floor to almost the top of the ceiling allow you to
see the outside at a glance.  A list of rules are posted on the wall,
stating that the thirst for revenge has no place on these grounds and
that it is forbidden to take your frustration out on your fellow
Guardians.

33031.name: Library
description: The musty smell of yellowed books and candle wax permeate the air,
promising to entice a sneeze.  Your eyes are drawn to flowers of
quartz and marble which frolic with the jade ivy growing up the walls,
so intricately carved that a spring breeze could rustle their stone
leaves and petals.  {-M{-u{-l{-t{-i{-c{-o{-l{-o{-r{-e{-d{x glass murals lie recessed in the
ivory arches of the ceilings, providing a kaleidoscope of light for
the room.  Row upon row of shelves line the expanse of the room
covered by neatly organized tomes and scroll tubes.  Scrolled maps lie
jumbled upon a large desk before a beady-eyed gnome.  Two beautiful sets
of large doors allow you to see outside into the garden.

33022.name: Ventor's Workshop
description: A total opposite to the room you have just left, this room is a
clutter of beakers, flasks, tomes, scrolls and many things you would
not dare try to identify.  The workshop of a wizard is a sacred place
in itself.  No other person could ever make sense of the chaos within.
A seldom used cot sits in one corner piled high with odds and ends.

33033.name: {3E{#ll{&i{7z{*a{7b{&e{#th'{3s {2R{@oo{2m{x
description: There is a medium-sized room on the top of the tower.  The walls
are covered with {!  Red {7and {#golden {7tapestries{x.  There is a big library
here.  As you examine some of the books you understand that they are
all similar with the title '{#I,Ellizabeth{7' .  Probably her
autobiography.  In the middle of the room there is a square table with
a {#golden {7candlestick on it that lights the room.  As you open the only
window of the room , your gaze meets the top of a {2forest {7with oak
trees.  There is also a big and comfortable bed with {%purple {7sheets.

33044.name: "L"-bend
description: This is another shoddy "L"-bend carved from the rocks below the
Guardians clan hall.  Though this one seems different somehow.  On the
south wall is a shelf filled with old, dusty and empty bottles.
Something is definitely odd here, as a breeze ,carrying the faint
smell of dust and decay, can be felt here but does not seem to come
from either north or east.  The caves lead north and east from here.

33040.name: Guard pet holding room
description: if you are in here, get out.

33025.name: Taliesin~
description:
Taliesin a bard of grest prestige, has traveled the world singing
his tales for all to hear.  He carries with him novelties and
artifacts plucked from the farthest reaches of Faerun.  The great
dreamer brings forth gifts of the Tylwth Teg, the Fair Fold.
33025.room_name: Taliesin stands here with all your armor needs.

33030.name: cuChulainn~
description:
A wiry build young man with an au empowering stature.  This is non-other
than the mighty cuChulainn, who single handily protected the city of
Ulaidh.
33030.d_flags: D How the hell did you do that?~
33030.room_name: CuChulainn is here, guarding the enterance.

33031.name: the librarian~
description: This grump glairs back at you, daring you to say something
subroutines:
F for AHMV
M GREET 33031 75%~
M ACT 33032 screams~
33031.room_name: A mean looking librarian is here.

33000.name: Morann~
description:
A tall cloaked man, shrouded in shadows, who sings the prophecies
of the world to come.  One of the greatest Druids to walk the earth,
Morann has predicted events as accurately as the famous scholar
Nostradamus.
Type 'heal' to see a listing of spells.
subroutines:
M GREET 33002 100~
M SPEECH 33033 i need a key~
33000.room_name: Morann is here, proudly serving the {RCr{rim{Rso{rn {BGu{bar{8di{ban{Bs{x.

33001.name: Queen Maeve~
description:
After the defeat of Maeve's armies she had a powerful enchantress
cast an evil spell over the Ulstermen.  She then had her armies attack
King Conor's domain.  cuChulainn was the only one not affected, and he
stood his ground against her armies to buy the kingdom time.
33001.d_flags: D I shouldn't have died, please note Kossuth~
subroutines:
F imm L
F res HIJL
F vul FM
33001.room_name: Queen Maeve is here, waiting for you to attack.

33005.name: The {-Swiss {-Miss{x~
description:
As you gaze at her beautity, all you notice is that she is perfect
in everyway.  Her eyes make you melt into a pool of slob.  You wish
you could take here home but, alas, she has a husband that would not
be happy.
33005.room_name: The {-Swiss {-Miss{x stands here ready to serve you food.

33006.name: the ref~
description:
This large being is here to enforce the rules of combat.  He is wearing
a striped shirt and black pants.  His blond hair and blue eyes make
him look nice, but beware, do not break the rules.
subroutines:
F res D
F vul GR
33006.room_name: A referee is standing here in a {8b{7l{8a{7c{8k {7and {8w{7h{8i{7t{8e {7s{8t{7r{8i{7p{8e{7d shirt.{x

33039.name: The pet shop owner.~
description:
You see before you a short but sturdy fellow, dressed in grey
garments.  A hood covers his entire head You see before you a short
but sturdy fellow, dressed in grey garments.  A hood covers his entire
head, but when he looks at you, you feel is sharp blue eyes piercing
into you.  A staff seems to be all that is holding this older fellow
up.  Brown, wooden sandles reviel something that looks like a hoof.
33039.room_name: Standing before you is the {RCr{rim{Rso{rn {BGu{bar{8di{ban{Bs {xpet shop owner.

33047.name: Dr. Schwartz~
33047.room_name: Dr. Schwartz is here, looking very busy.

33050.name: The Guild Master~
description:
Covered in nothing but long flowing dark robes, this figure stands
before you.  Locks of blonde hair can be seen comming out from the
hood where her face should be showing.  It is hard to tell much about
looks from a mere glance, only by getting closer can she really be
seen.  You have a feeling that would not be a good idea.
subroutines:
F for AHM
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
33050.room_name: A mystical figure stands here covered in robes.
33050.keywords: guardian guild master mystical figure crimson~

33051.name: Pryderi~
description:
This man has long golden hair framing his thin face.  His well muscled body
and the scars on his arms hint at having participated in many battles.  The
clothes he wears in his retirement from war are clean and well maintained but
loose and comfortable.  He handles his wares with the experience of one who
has used such items in the past.
subroutines:
F for AMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M GRALL 33003 100~
33051.room_name: Pryderi is here selling armor for young adventurers.

33052.name: Cu Roi, the Guardian Sorcerer~
description:
Cu Roi is a tall man who wears a long robe that ties in the front
and just barely touches the floor.  His face has no lines of age
even though he is older than most remember.  He sits behind his
table dispensing magics to the Crimson Guardians.
subroutines:
F for AV
F par BCDEFGHIJK
M SPEECH 33004 i need an insignia~
M GRALL 33029 100~
33052.room_name: Cu Roi is here selling scrolls and vials of magics.
